issue.title: Introduce Complex IntervalUnit
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11676](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11676). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11676?focusedCommentId=17286026) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
`[~ovrweb]` Can you first make your proposal on the dev@ mailing-list? (see links in https://arrow.apache.org/community/)

Format additions must be voted on by the Arrow core developers and project management committee.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11676?focusedCommentId=17287163) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Thread is here https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/rd7a49abb03bf68259bc8bd3d4550069c207f86e0a34bc2223bcc4b9c%40%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11676?focusedCommentId=17565539) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
